## Controller.mergeOptions() method

Merge options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mergeOptions(options: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | any | options to merge |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

Supplied options must be an object or container of options to merge
